Circuit Considerations

  1. Circuit prime
    • -Hemodilution
    • -Prime constituents/normalization
    • -Immediate treatment with initiation
    • -Direct thrombin inhibitors
  2. Heparin added
  3. Prime volume to weight conversion

Every 75mL of prime volume = One Kg. i.e. A circuit volume of 375mL is the weight equivalent to 5Kg or 5Kg could be added to the patients weight for drug calculations.
